q_text: Can this observation be used to conclude that bar N is a magnet? Explain why.
q_text1: Can this observation be used to conclude that bar N is a magnet? Explain why.
model solution: No. Bar N was attracted to the rod magnet [1]. This shows that bar N can either be a magnetic material or a magnet. In order to conclude that bar N is a magnet, repulsion between N and the rod magnet must occur. [1]
student answer: No because it may also be a magnetic material. Only magnets can repel each other.

q_text1: Match the command words to the correct description.
model solution:
Command words

Description

(i)

Identify

To select and/or name the object, event, concept or process. 

(ii)

State

To give a concise answer with little or no supporting argument.

(iii)

Explain

To provide reasons, supporting evidence or establish a relationship between two concepts.

(iv)

Describe

To give relevant details about an object or event. You are not required to explain your answer.
